alert.note: Alert for Pierce; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN PIERCE AND CENTRAL ROLETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM CDT... At 229 AM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Rolette to 10 miles west of Bisbee to 8 miles southeast of Wolford. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rolla, Rolette, Wolford, Belcourt, Shell Valley, Mylo, and Agate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
